Mewdeko Docs
Edit this page

Interface ILateBlocker

Interface to be implemented by modules that block execution after a command has been executed.

Namespace: Mewdeko.Common.ModuleBehaviors
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
public interface ILateBlocker

Properties

| Edit this page View Source

Priority

Gets the priority of the module. The lower the number, the higher the priority.

Declaration
int Priority { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
int

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

TryBlockLate(DiscordSocketClient, ICommandContext, string, CommandInfo)

Tries to block the execution of subsequent modules after a command has been executed.

Declaration
Task<bool> TryBlockLate(DiscordSocketClient client, ICommandContext context, string moduleName, CommandInfo command)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client.
ICommandContext context

The command context.
string moduleName

The name of the module.
CommandInfo command

The command that was executed.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a boolean indicating whether the module blocked the execution.
